jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis module

class jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.AgnosticPath(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Path

A class that can handle input with Windows () and/or posix (/) separators for paths

jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.get_sprite_frame(frames, frame_idx, loop=True)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.int_to_digits(n, max_digits=10)[source]

Convert an integer to a fixed-length array of digits in JAX.

If n exceeds the maximum expressible number, return all 9s.

jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.loadFrame(fileName, transpose=True)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.load_and_pad_digits(path_pattern, num_chars=10)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.pad_to_match(sprites)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.render_at(raster, y, x, sprite_frame, flip_horizontal=False, flip_vertical=False)[source]

Renders a sprite onto a raster at position (x,y) with optional flipping.

Parameters:

  • raster -- JAX array of shape (width, height, 3) for the target image

  • y -- Integer y coordinate for sprite placement

  • x -- Integer x coordinate for sprite placement

  • sprite_frame -- JAX array of shape (height, width, 4) containing RGB + alpha

jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.render_bar(raster, y, x, value, max, width, height, color, default_color)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.render_indicator(raster, y, x, value, sprite, spacing=15)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.render_label(raster, y, x, text, char_sprites, spacing=15)[source]
jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.render_label_selective(raster, y, x, all_digits, char_sprites, start_index, num_to_render, spacing=15)[source]

Renders a specified number of digits from a digit array at a given position.

Parameters:

  • raster -- The target raster.

  • y -- Top y-coordinate.

  • x -- Left x-coordinate for the first rendered digit.

  • all_digits -- JAX array containing all potential digits (e.g., from int_to_digits).

  • char_sprites -- JAX array of sprite frames for each digit (0-9).

  • start_index -- The index within all_digits to start rendering from.

  • num_to_render -- How many digits to render sequentially from start_index.

  • spacing -- Horizontal space between digits.

jaxtari.rendering.atraJaxis.update_pygame(pygame_screen, raster, SCALING_FACTOR=3, WIDTH=400, HEIGHT=300)[source]
